description: An AI-powered toolkit for lazy Game Masters (GMs) in tabletop RPGs like D&D 5e, providing generative tools for campaign prep, NPCs, locations, puzzles, and more, based on the Lazy GM's Resource Document.

techStack.styling: Tailwind CSS 4.1.13 with shadcn/ui and Radix UI primitives
techStack.uiComponents: shadcn/ui, Radix UI, Lucide React icons, Tiptap (rich text editor)
techStack.aiIntegration: Genkit 1.14.1 with Google AI (Gemini models via @genkit-ai/googleai)
techStack.buildTools: Turbopack (dev server on port 9002), tsx for AI flows

keyFeatures: Generative AI blocks for RPG elements (e.g., adventure ideas, NPCs, puzzles, plot hooks, magic items)
Campaign management with Firebase (create, edit, set active campaigns)
Local storage for active campaign persistence
integrations: Google Generative AI (via Genkit flows in src/ai/flows/)
Custom AI flows registered in src/ai/dev.ts

dependencies.other: recharts, embla-carousel-react, date-fns, dompurify, marked, turndown

environment.requires: GOOGLE_GENAI_API_KEY for AI features, Firebase config (NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_* env vars)

codeStructure.components: UI components (header, footer, generative-block, tiptap-editor, theme-provider)
codeStructure.ai: flows/ for Genkit AI generators, dev.ts for registration

docs: docs/lazy_gm/ contains Lazy GM Resource Document (Markdown, HTML, JSON formats for RPG prep resources)
